thread.title: LeBron James Is Working Too Hard
thread.title_full: LeBron James Is Working Too Hard - WSJ

author: Ben Cohen
title: LeBron James Is Working Too Hard
text:
It’s clear that LeBron James is still the best player in the NBA. But it’s unclear why the best player in the NBA is still playing more than anyone in the NBA. 

It’s past the halfway point of this season, and James is leading the league in minutes per game, which defies every trend of today’s NBA. James is a 32-year-old superstar on a team that should coast into the playoffs at a time when the league is more conscious than ever about...
